duties_responsibilities.duty: Welcome all customers with genuine and friendly enthusiasm through virtual and in-person interactions with clear and concise communication.
Maintain all service vows, including being prepared, welcoming, and meeting the needs of all customers, and providing exceptional service experience to multiple customers simultaneously.
Proactively address customer concerns and communicate the importance of alterations in perfecting the dress for the event.
Maintain store standards, respond promptly to customer questions, and build and maintain long-term customer relationships.
Engage in inventory management, support cash wrap behaviors, process transactions, and assist with sales promotions and visual updates.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent, or 1-2 years of prior retail experience in an apparel, service, or specialty store environment.
